body.title: Project goal
body.text:
The goal of this project was to have a more detailed presentation of my resume and my Github.

I chose to develop my portfolio using React Typescript to get familiar with this technology.

body.title: Project Production
body.text:
I started by making a list of the projects I wanted to showcase in my portfolio.

I designed my portfolio using Figma by choosing themes, colors, and functionality. I developed the portfolio while researching best practices for React Typescript.

I made sure to have all the data in my portfolio in JSON format to easily make updates over time.

body.title: Portfolio features:
body.text:
• Ability to filter projects by category
  • View my work experience filtered by theme
  • View and download my resume
  • A contact section to send me a message
  • Ability to switch between French and English languages
  • Easy navigation between sections using the navbar
